verses.name: Numbers 13:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 13:2
verses.text: Send thou men, that they may search the land of Canaan, which I give unto the children of Israel: of every tribe of their fathers shall ye send a man, every one a ruler among them.

verses.name: Numbers 13:3
verses.text: And Moses by the commandment of the Lord sent them from the wilderness of Paran: all those men were heads of the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 13:4
verses.text: And these were their names: of the tribe of Reuben, Shammua the son of Zaccur.

verses.name: Numbers 13:5
verses.text: Of the tribe of Simeon, Shaphat the son of Hori.
